DIA_Oliver_KQ407_Cutscene_03_08: From what I've been able to understand, he despises you because you use cowardly weapons.
DIA_Oliver_KQ407_Cutscene_03_13: Hmmm. Talk. Coward. The cage. I know! He says he won't tell us anything because, like cowards, we hide behind bars.
DIA_Oliver_KQ407_Cutscene_03_14: Okay Marvin, I'm going in there.
DIA_Oliver_KQ407_Cutscene_03_16: It's the only way to learn something!
